verbs.description: Beijing [V: has] fired back at President Donald Trump , after he announced $ 50 billion in tariffs on Chinese imports due to ' national security . '
[ARG0: Beijing] has [V: fired] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG2: at President Donald Trump] , [ARGM-TMP: after he announced $ 50 billion in tariffs on Chinese imports due to ' national security] . '
Beijing has fired back at President Donald Trump , after [ARG0: he] [V: announced] [ARG1: $ 50 billion in tariffs on Chinese imports] [ARGM-CAU: due to ' national security] . '
